response: as an ai language model developed by openai, i cannot express opinions or feelings, but i can provide you with some information about data privacy and social media platforms. social media platforms collect a lot of data from their users, which includes personal information such as email addresses, phone numbers, birth dates, and other sensitive details that are often used to target advertising campaigns. however, there have been many efforts to improve data privacy on social media platforms. for instance, facebook has introduced a new tool called 'clear history,' which allows users to delete their browsing history on the platform. twitter also recently announced plans to remove third-party access to its api, which will help prevent unauthorized access to user data. it is important for individuals to take steps to protect their personal information online and to be aware of privacy policies of social media platforms.<|endoftext|>
